author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve plug tips…I finished installing the valve but have to plug the shower head drop ear. One way to do it is with a copper plug and SharkBite Max cap. I like this option because I can swap it out for a washing machine angle valve which helps me get water to the shower for thin-mortar and joint compound 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #diy #sharkbiteplumbing #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Valve Plug Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
